name: Butterface
description:
Butterface

A thick lavish creme anglaise swirled with dark butterscotch, a real all day vape in my eyes.

Created by me, Nevans.

Get the one-shot now at chefs flavours.

https://www.chefsflavours.co.uk/nick-n-mix-one-shots/6627-butterface.html
author: Nickevz

reviews.text: Youve gotta be kiddin me? 2 reviews?  This juice is off the chain!  Name says it all smooth sweet buttery goodness!  ADV material for sure, great balance with your flavors. Not over the top flavor not weak, just right for my kind of vape. This juice made a believer out of me for tahitian van cream.  Im currently using it in a PB ice cream recipe im working on because of this juice.  Thanks a ton for sharing!!!! Should have 20 5 star reviews at this point!!!!
Pretty tasty and very buttery what im actually not enjoying that much but overall good combo of WF and LB to build the body. Very thick, smooth and buttery right in the face! :) recommended!
Absolutely delicious. My kinda vape. Sweet & so creamy. I just love butterscotch. 10/10 from me 😋
